sections.heading: fishing; commission; powers.The commission may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to open specified waters to underwater, powered spear fishing and limit or control such powered spear fishing

sections.text:
37-544.Spear fishing; commission; powers.

The commission may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to open specified waters to underwater, powered spear fishing and limit or control such powered spear fishing.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 922, ยง 264.
